title: Should League Add An AP QSS item?
body:
**Should there be a QSS item for AP? **
From my experienc of playing mid lane i think there should be an item that removes debuffs on the champion but for AP, like Mercurial Scimitar. it seems like in moblie mid laners ( E.g. Xerath, zyra, lux etc) seems to get aimed down quite easily and bet bursted by the entire enemy team from getting caught out.
Should there be an QSS like item For AP mid laners?

replies.body:
It might be a worth while item, though Zonya's is meant to fill the QSS neiche for AP champions.  The thinking (Correct me if i'm wrong) during the item creation was probably along the lines of "Casters need to have time to bring their cool downs back slightly during combat", while the persistant DPS of AD champions, which requires no cool downs, merited more of a cleanse type item anyway. 

Once you factor in the crucible existing as a cleanse, you essentially have a self cleanse (To mantain DPS output), a stasis (To enable AP to regain cool downs), and a "Cleanse your allies" to give more team play. Add in the near worthless summoner spell, that can't cleanse all CC's and there is not much reason to give AP casters an AP QSS style item, as it would remove most counter play from hyper mobile, low cool down casters (Looking at Kassadin and LB), which zonya's does provide.
a few CC's render summoner spells inoperable, meaning cleanse is near useless on any champion, especially once you consider QSS and zonya's exist.\
Zhonyas fills that function.  Unless you also want an ad zhonyas?

So you want a AP Qss item on the AP Chamption (eg. Leblanc) let say she was 10/1/0 on the first 20 mins of the game and let say her team is bunch of noob and your Team only got 1 hard CC for Leblanc that can kill her which is WW ult. So now if you think about it now i got you a example. Do you srsly still think AP Qss was a good idea?

Well if it was only 20 minutes in and an ap qss item existed, it would theoretically build out of qss, Leblanc could just have qss and it wouldn't matter because its to early in the game for her to even have finished the ap qss item even if there was one, however I say no to ap qss item just wanted to point out how dumb your hypothetical situation was.
no you have hourglass for a reason
